name: The Laundromat
description: The Laundromat is a movie starring Gary Oldman, Antonio Banderas, and AJ Meijer. A widow investigates an insurance fraud, chasing leads to a pair of Panama City law partners exploiting the world's financial system.
keywords: mossack fonseca scandal,panama papers scandal,greed,flamboyant villain,evil banker

review.name: Enjoyable exposé of offshore banking
review.reviewBody: This is an enjoyable, funny, exposing portrayal of the corrupt system of offshore accounts and how some apparently disconnected events share links back to the corruption at work. Maybe it shouldn't be funny because this is an infuriating reality that could be fixed if...well, if legislators were themselves not corrupt. Yes, the telling of the tale is not done in a totally conventional straight-forward linear way. But it is easy to follow and amusing, even as you feel you should be angry. And of course you realise that this film won't change a thing. But it is well made and acted.

trailer.name: Official Trailer
trailer.description: 'The Laundromat' follows a group of journalists who uncover the illicit money networks at the heart of the Panama Papers - documents that exposed a huge international system of legal swindling.
